Issue.creator: mshamory
Issue.summary: Sawtooth Seth - contract list includes invalid addresses
Issue.description: After successfully calling an existing contract,Â the caller account's nonce is incremented despite not having created a new account from the address. (possibly for compatibility with RPC clients) This causes a new address to appear appears in the contract list despite the address with that nonce not being used. Running _seth show account_ with this address returns that there is nothing there.
